# outputs/tables

## Purpose

Stores CSV summaries for each simulation run and validation save action.

## Generated By

- `utils/output_manager.py` via `save_table(...)`
- save actions in `app.py`

## Typical Fields

- run metadata (`place`, `terrain`, `season`, horizon)
- accumulation statistics (`max`, `mean`, `variance`)
- validation metrics (`rmse`, `l2`, relative error)

## Version Control

Do not commit generated table files.
